text: Claudia L. Tenney (born February 4, 1961) is an American attorney and politician. She has been the U.S. representative for New York's 24th congressional district since 2023. Before, she represented the 22nd district from 2017 to 2019 and from 2021 to 2023 and sat in the New York State Assembly from 2011 to 2016. She is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Representative Claudia Tenney official U.S. House website * Campaign website * * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from New York (state) Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Claudia Tenney
